See the 14 * GNU General Public License for more details. 15 * 16 * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License 17 * along with this program. If not, see <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. 18 * 19 * Author: Lucas Hernández Abreu 20 * Contact: lucas.hernandez.09@ull.edu.es 21 */ 22 32 #ifndef NULL_UNIT_H 33 #define NULL_UNIT_H 34 35 #include "../processing_unit_interface.h" 36 37 class NullUnit : public ProcessingUnitInterface { 38 public: 39 // Default constructor 40 NullUnit(); 41 42 // Destructor 43 ~NullUnit(); 44 45 // Does nothing 46 void Run(void*) override; 47 48 // Doesn't allocate nothing 49 void Start(void** = nullptr) override; 50 51 // Doesn't delete nothing 52 void Delete() override; 53 54 ProcessingUnitInterface* Clone() override; 55 }; 56 57 #endif
